# Slide 1 foobar --- # Slide 2 foobar   Marp for VS Code https://github.com/marp-team/marp-vscode
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=marp-team.marp-vscode
 Marp CLI https://github.com/marp-team/marp-cli
Install npm install -g @marp-team/marp-cli   Basic usage  Convert to HTML  marp slide-deck.mdormarp slide-deck.md -o output.html
 Convert to PDF (–pdf)  marp --pdf slide-deck.md marp slide-deck.md -o converted.pdf    Convert to PowerPoint document (–pptx)  marp --pptx slide-deck.md marp slide-deck.md -o converted.pptx   Other usage   Reference Marpï¼šç”¨ Markdownã€Œå†™ã€PPT çš„æ–°é€‰æ‹© (Marp)
